name: Driftship (Snowy Fox)
description:
STEP 3: MAKE A GAME IN TWO DAYS

A little hovership time trial game made in Godot.

The goal is simple: set the fastest time you can without crashing.

Still early days in my game dev challenge, but I'm pretty happy with how this has turned out. Certain little things took a lot longer than I thought they would. If I'd had a bit more time and energy, I would have spent them making a prettier track to race around, or possibly even several, with a selection between them.

In total, this took me about eighteen hours to make.

This game, and all of its art and audio assets, were made by me.
